note: I'm a halfbreed: old Norse and old Hebrew. A native of Manhattan. A co-operativist, not a collectivist. Husband of a Bavarian. Rescuer of pitbulls. Keeper of brave cats. Gardener. Deadhead. 2nd generation hippie. Threat hunter focused on the wetware, because that malware didn't write itself. Targeted by Al Qaida in 2002, banned by Russia in 2022. I come by my enemies honestly, and I make friends slowly. I come in peace and I expect the same.
